# Lily Livered

> A one-page logo site template for domains that deserve better than a parking page.

## About

Lily Livered is an open-source template for putting a logo on a domain that
doesn't have (or need) a full website. Built with Astro 5, deployed on
Cloudflare Pages.

Replace this file with your own company info when you use the template.

## What This Site Does

- Displays a single SVG logo, centered and responsive
- Serves robots.txt and sitemap for SEO
- Supports Google Analytics 4, Microsoft Clarity, and Cloudflare Web Analytics
- Generates Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags from config

## Technical Details

- Framework: Astro 5 (static site generator)
- Hosting: Cloudflare Pages (edge deployment)
- Analytics: off-thread via Partytown
- Template source: https://github.com/vinsonconsulting/lily-livered

## Contact

- Author: Jim Vinson
- Website: https://jimvinson.com
